subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: One of the most feared big men in N.B.A. history, Shaquille O’Neal, left Dwight Howard out of the conversation about today’s top centers, which included the Nets’ Brook Lopez.
snippet: One of the most feared big men in N.B.A. history, Shaquille O’Neal, left Dwight Howard out of the conversation about today’s top centers, which included the Nets’ Brook Lopez.
